attributes.action: Make sure child maintenance does get used for the child . Not fund a Life style
attributes.additional_details:
To make to money be used for the correct intention and not to fund a lifestyle …
Then a lot of child would get what they need 
And not go with out food or clothing .
attributes.background:
Put in place the option of allowing the paying parent , to pay via child clothing vouchers 
Food vouchers , gas or electric credits . 
Make the receiving parent use the money for what it’s intended for.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588390
